data.text: @usuariodetuirer @justinbieber @selenagomez @Skrillex She's talking about how everyone was saying her and her boyfriend wouldnt last but they did

@usuariodetuirer @justinbieber @selenagomez @Skrillex Lmao. Mariah Carey is main/sole writer in all of her songs and thats Ty Dolla in the back. Extra writer credits are either a few lines or because some parts of production can also be seen as a writers credit
